Effective but can't patent, so no profits.  Greedy Rx corps only want BIG profits.   Quinine works.  Has for centuries.
Ask South America where the cinchona tree had its bark as a folk remedy - for centuries.
Long ago, in America, the gin and tonic(=quinine)=health.
